dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1313 IS: Strong Lungs, Strong Lives Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Brown (for himself, Mr. Blumenthal, Mrs. Murray, and Mr. Durbin) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To expand eligibility for reimbursement for smoking cessation services to include copayments for such services paid after fiscal year 2009 by covered beneficiaries under the TRICARE program who are eligible for Medicare.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Strong Lungs, Strong Lives Act of 2015.

section.header: Expansion of reimbursement for smoking cessation services for certain TRICARE beneficiaries
section.text: Section 713(f) of the Duncan Hunter National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2009 (Public Law 110–417; 122 Stat. 4503) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1)(A), by striking during fiscal year 2009;
in paragraph (1)(B), by striking during such period; and
in paragraph (2), by striking during fiscal year 2009 and inserting after September 30, 2008.
